subject: Thank you for your recent application, we accepted your loan request
body:
Your credit doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE pocket money to spend ANY way you like, or simply require to LOWER your payments by a third or more, here is best deal we can offer you TONIGHT (hurry, this offer will expire THIS NIGHT):
$433,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest current payments!
Hurry, when our deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill this quick form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
http://fastmarelous.com/
